name: Drill away!
description:
Mine away! Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 entry.

Dig down into the ground and go as far as you can! Keep an eye on fuel gauge and avoid obstacles in the way! Enjoy :)   

Controls are Left/Right or A/D. 

Say hi on YouTube SunnyValleyStudio ! I have multiple tutorials about procedural generation that might be of interest to you :)
